definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: He used squares of clay where he curved individual Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 他在每個正方體陶塊上刻上一個漢字用於印刷。

sentences.english: There is a cube, the length is 3cm, the breadth is 3cm, and the high is 3cm.
sentences.chinese: 一個正方體紙盒，棱長3釐米，求它的表面積。

sentences.english: The center square emerges to bring light from the heights of the vestibule.
sentences.chinese: 中央正方體從視覺高度上凸出，保證了自然光的採用。

sentences.english: There are 18 squires. They are red, yellow and blue.
sentences.chinese: 紅黃藍三種顏色的正方體共18個。

definition: hot pot containing stinky tofu and other ingredients (Taiwanese dish)
variant of 附會|附会[fu4 hui4]
on call/always available/ready at all times
produce/fresh fruits and vegetables/fresh aquatic food/fresh herbs
imagawayaki (sweet snack made of batter cooked in the shape of a car wheel, stuffed with azuki bean paste or other fillings)
